input.sentences: the party was just starting to kick off when 3 lovely ladies showed up .
[male] really did n't want to be serving at this party .
[male] was happy to just be | he loved meeting new people at his job .
[female] could n't run out of there fast enough when the people started pouring in .
[male] and [male] watched the party from outside the window .
output.sentences: The horderves at the start of the party.look as lovely as the people.
The gentleman in the black suit has alcoholic drinks on a serving platter.
Another gentleman in a black suit has water on a serving platter and he is meeting the people as they arrive.
It started pouring rain so everyone started to run for cover.
From the window, the hostess watched the street outside from the party to see who was arriving.
